New Records: Mitchell Santner became the first New Zealand spinner to take a five-wicket haul at a Cricket World Cup
Key Match Events: Will Young (70), stand-in skipper Tom Latham (53) and Rachin Ravindra (51) all shining in New Zealand's batting performance
Mitchell Santner took five for 59 with his left-arm spin
Colin Ackermann (69) made a battling half-century for the Netherlands
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand avenged their narrow defeat in the 2019 World Cup final after beating England by nine wickets in Ahmedabad last week
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands suffered their second consecutive defeat after losing their opening game against Pakistan by 81 runs
New Zealand had a slow, dry wicket to bat on
Others: Mitchell Santner missed out with two of three run-out chances
